describe: This is a sunset scene, in the distance there are white clouds and clear blue sky.
This is a sunset scene, the sky is covered with clouds, it is getting ready for night.
This is a gloomy sky, with signs of an impending thunderstorm.
This is a scene where the sky is dark and lightning appears.
This is a scene of clear blue sky in the middle of a field, in the middle of the picture surrounded by clouds.
This is a scene where the sky is dark, with many white lightning appearing around the sky.
This is a scene in the middle of the desert with many rays of light shining down after a rain.
This is a scene of dark sky, lightning shining brightly through many layers of clouds.
This is a scene in the middle of a country road, in the distance a large yellow lightning bolt appears in the middle of the road.
This is a scene of a purple sky filled with lightning and clouds.
This is the sound of showers flowing along with thunder.
This is the sound of wind blowing loudly in the rain.
